title: Practitioner Competency Enhancement Course for Promoting Cognitive Health in Older Adults

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of gerontological psychology and health management
context.additional_context: Field-applicable training for practitioners affiliated with companies providing speech therapy and elderly care services

learning_goals: Learners can identify core symptom elements—such as pain, sleep quality, and dyspnea—with 80% accuracy when assessing older adults’ self-perceived cognitive health status.
Learners can design and apply three or more personalized health management strategies (e.g., physical activity, nutritional management) for elderly populations in a simulated environment.
Through VR-based scenario assessments, learners can establish practical plans to manage depression/fatigue symptoms with over 90% participation engagement.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
